name: Perdomo - Nick´s Sticks Little Havana Blend - Sun Grown - Robusto
brand: Perdomo, Nick´s Sticks Little Havana Blend, Sun Grown
additionalNotes: Nick Perdomo is the founder of Perdomo Cigars and the man responsible for creating an extensive portfolio of blends that are well-made, well-priced and exceptionally popular among cigar lovers. High quality control standards and consistently rich flavors with an attractive range of strengths have made Perdomo a requested brand. With several wrapper varieties to choose from, Perdomo has a distinct blend for every palate.
